p.s: Environmental pollution, a big problem for all of us, made by humans.
Ankita Mitra wrote a text about Environmentalenvironmental pollution.
There she explainexplains environmental pollution, there causes and effects.
Environmental pollution has a big effect on our nature and the whole world.
More overMoreover it effectsaffects us and all the living beings.
Without air and water, this planet would be destroyed and no man, no animals, no plants would survive.
The environmental pollution is growing in the last years pretty much.
The cause, the increasing urbanization, increasing industrialization and more.
All things we achieved cost out health and the health of the flora and fauna.
Now a lot of people are protesting against environment pollution.
Over all environmental pollution is a big problem for all of us on the curt, what was caused by our evolution in many themes.
